# Amazing Product Features

[ANIMATE type="slideIn"]
Welcome to the future of productivity!
[/ANIMATE]

## Why Choose Us?

[GRID cols="3"]
[CELL]
### (fa)rocket(/fa) Fast
Lightning-fast performance that saves you time every day.
[/CELL]

[CELL]  
### (fa)shield-alt(/fa) Secure
Bank-level security keeps your data safe and protected.
[/CELL]

[CELL]
### (fa)heart(/fa) Easy
Intuitive design that anyone can master in minutes.
[/CELL]
[/GRID]

## Product Demo

## Pricing Plans

[COLUMNS]
[COLUMN]
### Basic Plan
- $9.99/month
- 5 users included
- Basic support
- 10GB storage

[LINK url="https://signup.example.com/basic"]Get Started[/LINK]
[/COLUMN]

[COLUMN]
### Pro Plan  
- $19.99/month
- 25 users included
- Priority support
- 100GB storage
- Advanced features

[LINK url="https://signup.example.com/pro"]Choose Pro[/LINK]
[/COLUMN]
[/COLUMNS]
